overview:
Pfefferspray is a web browsing platform that lets users interact around content in a completely new way. StormDriver provides a single social overlay for the whole Web, without having to install any software.

The users are able to access web content without leaving the system, and enjoy a unique set of interactions. They can see who else is on the page theyâ€™re on, where others came from and where theyâ€™re going. They can comment, vote, discuss and express emotions even on pages that offer no native social functionalities.

Pfefferspray is a project developed by Concego - an IT Consulting and Outsourcing Firm based in Oslo, Norway. StormDriver is created by an international team based in Norway, Poland, Argentina, India and the USA.
